mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BD_DATA_DICT ( id, type, parentId, code, name, modifyAble, valid, createDate, lastUpdateDate, remark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{type}, #{parentId}, #{code}, #{name}, #{modifyAble}, #{valid}, #{createDate}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{remark} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE BD_DATA_DICT
parentId = #{parentId,javaType=java.lang.String},
type = #{type,javaType=java.lang.String},
code = #{code,javaType=java.lang.String},
name = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
valid = #{valid,javaType=boolean},
modifyAble = #{modifyAble,javaType=boolean},
remark = #{remark,javaType=java.lang.String},
lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
WHERE id = #{id}
